snippet: If Tiger Woods wins the British Open this week, he has a chance to reclaim golf’s top ranking.
abstract: Tiger Woods has a chance to reclaim golf's top ranking if he wins the British Open; to become No. 1, Woods must win and the current No. 1 Luke Donald must finish lower than a tie for third.
lead_paragraph: If Tiger Woods wins the British Open this week, he has a chance to reclaim golf’s top ranking.

headline.seo: Return to No. 1 Is in Sight for Tiger Woods
headline.main: Return to No. 1 Spot in Rankings Is in Sight for Woods
headline.print_headline: A Return To No. 1 Is in Sight For Woods
